image_processor module¶

image_processor.canny_edge_detection(images)[source]¶

Performs Canny edge detection on the images

Parameters:images (array) – images to process
Returns:edge-detected images, processing status, and processing times
image_processor.check_dimensions(image)[source]¶

Downsamples image if any dimension exceeds 1024 pixels

Parameters:image (array) – image
Returns:downsampled image
image_processor.contrast_stretching(images)[source]¶

Rescales the intensity of the images to the maximum range

Parameters:images (array) – images to process
Returns:contrast-stretched images, processing status, and processing times
image_processor.create_histograms(images)[source]¶

Create histograms for images

Parameters:images (array) – images
image_processor.histogram_equalization(images)[source]¶
Performs histogram equalization on the images.
For color images, RGBA is converted to RGB. RGB is converted to HSV. Histogram equalization is performed on V.
Parameters:images (array) – images to process
Returns:histogram-equalized images, processing status, and processing times
image_processor.log_compression(images)[source]¶

Returns the logarithm of the image

Parameters:images (array) – images to process
Returns:log images, processing status, and processing times
image_processor.open_images(filepaths)[source]¶

Reads images from files and returns the list of images

Parameters:filepaths (string, or list of strings) – paths to image files
Returns:images and image dimensions
Return type:list
image_processor.reverse_video(images)[source]¶

Inverts the color of the images i.e. negative

Parameters:images (array) – images to process
Returns:inverted images, processing status, and processing times
image_processor.run_image_processing(filepaths, command)[source]¶
Reads uploaded images from file (if file exists) and returns processed
images with associated metadata. If an image fails to be processed, the processed image will be the same as the uploaded image.
Parameters:
  • filepaths (string, or list of strings) – paths to image files to process
  • command (int) – image processing command
Returns:

processed images, processing status, and processing times
Return type:

dict
image_processor.validate_inputs(filepaths, command)[source]¶
Validate input parameter types. Removes invalid filepaths and
sets invalid command to default.
Parameters:
  • filepaths (string, or list of strings) – paths to image files
  • command (int) – image processing command
Returns:

valid filepaths and command
